column5: Well appointed and pet friendly STUDIO for up to 3 adults or 2 adults and 2 children. Has 2 twin beds and futon bed. Fully equipped kitchen has stove, fridge & microwave. Bathroom has a walk in shower. The complex has a nice pool & BBQ grill. Located across the street to the beach and close to restaurants, shops & bars. Check our other Airbnb studios. https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/18276051 https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/18310167
